Class ExpenseServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.FinFlow.FinanceManager.services.expense.ExpenseServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExpenseService
@Service public class ExpenseServiceImpl extends Object implements ExpenseService
Service implementation for managing expenses.
